Introduction

Kwanghee is a South Korean singer, actor, and MC under Bonboo Entertainment. He is a member of the boy group ZE:A and their subunit ZE:A 4U.

In 2012 he participated in the show “We Got Married,” where he was paired with SECRET’s Sunhwa.

On February 7, 2017, Kwanghee joined Bonboo Entertainment. In January 2022, he renewed his contract with the company.

Kwanghee has been the fixed MC of “Weekly Idol” since January 9, 2019.
